name: Staticman
description: A Node.js application that enables dynamic content as part of a fully static website.

RSA_PRIVATE_KEY.description: RSA private key used for encrypting site config secrets.

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: Application ID used if authenticating using GitHub application flow.

GITHUB_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key used if authenticating using GitHub application flow.

GITLAB_TOKEN.description: Access token used if authenticating with GitLab account.
